Signal Explanations.req: request input signal of the module
Signal Explanations.ack: acknowledge output signal of the module

Logical Operators Explanation.$rose: a function that returns true when a rising edge is detected on a signal
Logical Operators Explanation.|->: an overlapping implication operator meaning that if the condition on the left is met then the condition on the right must hold SINCE THE CURRENT CLOCK CYCLE
Logical Operators Explanation.##: a delay operator specifying that the condition on the right should be evaluated after a defined number of clock cycles

Assertion 1.Assertion Explaination: if a rising edge is detected on the request input signal then, after a delay of two clock cycles, a rising edge is detected on the acknowledge output signal
